detail_desc: Top in soft, printed cotton jersey. Bottoms in a soft, airy cotton weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Contrasting colour trims at the pockets, sides and hems.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening and one inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a quilted lining in a contrasting colour. Polyester filling.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in sturdy cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, and an elasticated seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with an adjustable ankle strap that has a hook and loop fastening. Imitation suede linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short-sleeved dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a patterned weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and low crotch. Side pockets, fake back pockets, and straight legs with creases.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neck and small opening with buttons at the front. Short cap sleeves, broderie anglaise frills at the top and a gathered seam at the chest.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in scuba fabric with a low waist.

Short-sleeved playsuit in softly draping woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with notch lapels and concealed buttons at the top. Flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back, elastication at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide legs with pleats at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Moss-knit cardigan in soft cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a frill over the shoulders and narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved sports top in thermal, marled functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a zip at the top with a chin guard. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined, textured swimsuit.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slightly shorter, skinny legs.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and long sleeves. Zip down the front that continues down one leg and foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Push-up bra in mesh and lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Decorative seams at the knees, down the legs and at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and hem. Unlined.
Long, circular skirt in a double layer of tulle to create extra movement and width. High waist with wide, covered elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck opening at the top and a vertical seam down the front.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a peplum.
Tube top in smocked cotton jersey with a frill trim top and bottom.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline and flounce at the top that continues across the shoulders. Overlocked edges.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Chelsea boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in airy cotton seersucker with elastication at the top, narrow, double shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Body in jersey with cut-out sections and a metal ring at the waist, high-cut legs and press-studs at the crotch.
Soft bandeau bras in lace and jersey with a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the sides. Mesh lining at the front.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in a soft, hole-knit cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top and slits in the sides.

Calf-length satin dress with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a gently draped effect, an elasticated seam at the waist and a small frill trim around the neckline, waist and skirt. Lined at the top.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Necklace in fabric cord with pendants in plexiglass and metal. Adjustable length 35-43 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.
Short jumper in a soft, fine knit with shoulder pads, long, slightly wider sleeves with decorative gathers, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully-lined bikini. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Matching bottoms.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a sheen. The dress has one shoulder, a frill at the top, seam at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined bodice.
Metal rings in various shapes and designs.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Wide elastic trim at the hem and no fastening.
Jacket in an airy, patterned weave with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Parka in cotton twill with a stand-up collar and integral hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed fasteners down the front, a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Longer at the back with a single back vent. Lined.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, and ties at the back.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a padded, lined hood with a drawstring at the front and an adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the back, a yoke and a zip down the front. Drawstring below the bust and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Recycled polyester filling.
Sleeveless tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered, elasticated frill around the neckline and armholes.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a frill-trimmed yoke in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Jacket in washed denim with slightly worn details. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.

Non-wired, push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, partially lace-covered shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short-sleeved A-line dress in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with an embroidered appliqué.
Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short blouse in a crinkled, textured weave with short puff sleeves and buttons and inset lace trims down the front. Smocking with a frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
Fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with a low-cut back and short sleeves.

Fully lined bikini top with lightly padded cups, a decorative knot detail at the front, side support and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Cropped top in jersey with lacing at the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a raw, roll-edge hem.

Kangol x H&M. Short, fitted dress in jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with double-layered shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the front. Contrasting colour panels with a drawstring down the sides that ends at the hem.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey -lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with short, wide sleeves, a gathered yoke, shimmering buttons at the back and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and gathered skirt.
